objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 47 leaves in Merapi-Merbabu script, using layar in Indonesian mode. Apparently written in year 1564 of an uncertain era.

projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

body.ab:
// // Om̐ Avighnamastu // // kīraṇaḥ viyaktiḥ candraghniḥ, dvijodaḥ koviḥ marutaraḥ, nahan· bhyakta pinakaśarira bhaṭāra, milv aja:nma gave bhuvaṇa sira ta:ṣvatanu ṅaranira, sīra ta:ṣvadeśomidәṙ pinakavәṅku, sira t ahuripnikaṁ rat·, sira dumadyakәn· vr̥
ddhiniṁ janma kabeḥ, praṇapraṇī saṙvva hurip· Ikanaṅ u:rip· lavan avak·, śarira pamisanya riṁ sadharadeya, magumavay ikaṁ saṙvvadadī, sira: sinaṅguḥ purvvaniṁ janma Umijil taṅ a:ṣṭatanu rat·, nara mr̥gha paśu janma svavara, pakṣī śarīśr̥pa miṇa, prabhavaniṅ adharadeya prabhu ra:ma R̥ṣī
tiga sira, prammana riṁ rat·, pakәniṁ bhuvaṇa, tuvi sīra tan duḥkha piś ikī guruniṁ janma: kabeḥ, līnraranikiṁ candanira ṅkaṇa, sira tika sidaguru, sīra haṣṭa:gaṇa gumavay ikaṁ vaṙva:sәk lumraḥ Ikaṅ a:kṣaropamavak·, Ika ta guru ṅaranya, yekī tuvin a:stu hurip·, ya sinaṅguḥ guru laghu
ya panakamula canda, Avakniṁka guru la:ghu, lavann urip masaṁyoga, Umijil tikaṁ trigaṇa Adәghnikaṁ guru la:ghu, haniganigeṁ sagaṇa, yeka:ṣṭagaṇa ṅaranya, sa maha:dyapare vatva:ṙ mvaṁ laku śloka nihan len·, // // sakveḥ saṁ sujana:di haṙṣa hirikaṁ canda: nihan kavruhī, yan ma
1
hyun· vruha rupaniṁ laghu lavan tika: sinaṅguḥ guru, bhaiddha:niṁ guru la:ghu yeṅtakna:mvaṁ huṅgvaniṁ hakṣara, sakveḥniṁ guru yeriṅә:nhilahileka: yan· salaḥ ka:svanan· bhyakta:niṁ guru saṙvva diṙgha taruṅa: saṁyogapa:ranṅәn·, lavan· vakaṙṇna visaṙjja ka:niśurahan· śvara: vatә
k· vyañjana, E Ai, nahan anuṁ kayatnakna len· hoho vkasniṁ guru, vus meṅә:t pva kiterikha: niyata yan· śotan ta dadya vacan· lviṙniṁ hakṣara gantuṅәn mapakne vakta mvaṅ aṅgantuṅa, saṁyoga:para śūkṣma lakṣmaṇa śivaghnī kleṣa lakṣmi khunaṁ, nda:n· gla:na stula ṇaghna vighna mamәvә: niṙ
vighna ma:ra stitī, svapna sneha rikaṁ dvitiya khahaḍaṁ riṁ dla:ha yan paphala ṅahniṁ tikṣṇa murub· riṅ agni ya khaton· rasminya sateja ya, masna:na pva kiteṁ nadī masīh ikaṁ saslesma tumla:ṅa:kәn·, riṁ sma:ruṅgva sahiṣnu nora pinaṅan· maṅliḥ maṅaṅgantuṅa, yapvan· bheddha sakoja
rojarakna maṅke ṅaliknya vacan·, // 0 // gәlaṇa saṁ lagәnan· para riṁ sәma, vighәna tiksaṇa yogi riṁ tulya ya, divadaśeka tahunya saniṙypaghәna, masupәna pva vadu sumәneha ya vagәmi yan saḍәmi ṅahәmi haḍi, tuvi kәleṣa vinaṁśa ṣalakṣәmi, sәpinikaṁ
brata maṙgganikan· kәL̥m·, kramaniṅ akṣara yan· jinaja:r ika // 0 // lvīṙniṁ saṁyoga parekī, kakyan kakyan kakvan kakvan·, kakran hanṅәn aṅgantuṁ, kayatnakәn· tmәn· tmәn· Antaḥpada guru yati, kalavan· śvara kamadya, diṙ=gha: diṙ=gha: vattavatī, tavat· guru
praśiddha ya diṙ=gha: turuṅa surahan·, visaṙ=ja: lavann ajuṁjuṁ, kalavan· guru saṁyoga, nahan taṁ sinaṅguḥ guru nihan taṁ śvara kamadya, A A I Ī U Ū E O, tan dadi muṅguḥ riṁ tṅaḥ, vvit tan juga paknanya // 0 // sampun ikaṁ pratekanikanaṁ guru dinliṅakәn·, nya t ajaR̥n muvaḥ padulu
riṁ guru laghu vuvusәn·, kveḥnya savargga muṅguh ikanaṁ vacan aniganiga, yeka sinaṅguhan gaṇa ṅaranya si pati ṅa kavi puṙvva nihan maka:raṅ araniṁ guru tiga sagaṇa, la:ghu kunaṁ panәṇḍasani luṅguhi yakaragaṇa, yapvan ikaṁ raka:ragaṇa la:ghu maḍuḍuk i tṅaḥ, hetunikaṁ śaka:raga
ṇ amatyәṅ aguru vkasan· vru pva kita: taka:ra ṅaraniṁ laghu tpi kavurī, ja:tinikaṁ jaka:ragaṇa maṅkana guru riṁ tṅaḥ, bhakti jugaṁ bhaka:ragaṇa riṁ guru sira rumuhun·, na:karaga:ṇa tlva maduluṙ tika ya laghu paḍa nya laghu karva saṁ guru pasaṅgahanīka śi lalo, śeṣaniṅa: ga
2
ṇeki vkasīṁ guru laghu vinuvus·, riṁ haji canda teki yan avas· śiva haji piturun·, saṁ R̥ṣi bhaṅśapatra manitaḥ sira tiki manatha // 0ṙ // nihan gaṇani hayya yeṅtakna, jakara: kalavan· bhakara: śakara, catuṙ laghu guru rva yeka ta lima, lviḥnya guru la:ghu ka:nәm ikahәn·
lavan hana ta matra yeṅtakna, vilaṅnya rikanaṁ sapada matәtәg·, Ikaṁ padha kapuṙvvaka: tlu kunaṁ, gnәp· rvavlas aṅgәpanya tuturan· kapiṁ rva nikihәn pva ya vvaluvlas·, tumut limaṁ vlas· padhanya vkasan·, tan eva tiya tapa taṙ lya vinuvus·, samaṅkana vilaṁni matra nikhihәn· mvaṅ uṅgvanikanaṁ
naṁ jakara: matәtәg·, kapi rva maṅnәm· dvitiya kaśulam·, padha rva ya ta hīṅaniṅ maṅ amilaṁ, kayatnakna saṁ vatәk kavivara // 0 // tri gaṇa guṇa gaṇita ya guṇitan·, prakaraṇa vaṇa karuṇa, Aruṇa daruṇa bharuṇa śaraṇa, Avaraṇa bharaṇa hapaṇa ṇa gәṁ guṇa kuṇi kuṇa
kaṇvi kaṇi khaṇikha len·, ghraṇa hagaṇa ghrahaṇa samiraṇa, praṇava vaṇiya vaṇiya paṇitaṇitan·, sahaṇa huruta pa:ṇa ṇa giṅa yatika paṇḍita paṇḍava paṇḍura paṇḍu, piṇḍaṅa piṇḍama paṇḍamap iṇḍa, laṇḍap alaṇḍәp alaṇḍup aleṇḍo, gaṇḍi giṇaṇḍī ḍiṇәṇḍa ṇa ma
gәṁ dharaṇa va:raṇa tahaṇa bhaṇa, veśraṇa vaṙṇna vaṇi ṣaṇa kaṙṇna, Aṙṇnava vaṙṇna supaṙṇna ya veṙṇna, veṙṇna ta puṙṇnama ghuṙṇnita ṇa gәṁ khagantuṅa deniṁ ṇa gәṁ, ṭā ṭa ḍa ḍa: ṇa riṁ ṇa guṁ, ta tha da dha na riṁ na lit·, vaṙṇna doḥ yasa savaṙgga liṁ saṁ, ka:vi, voteṁ, maṙgga // //
Uṅgvanikaṁ na lit tapaknekī, nda: savaneḥnya rikaṁ paknanta, saṁ natha maṅkana tekana ḍmit·, kapva masakhya nihan savaneḥnya muni muna nana samanuṣya, Anumana hana namī namī, dina dhana nadi nadha na:na, hani hina tan ana hiḥnītuṁ ḥ pranatha natha pratapa tinitananya, tanah atunaḥ pina,
tatva tana tanya, nitha vanitha: nini ninī tanu tanī, manana vana: malinī nali hikahәn· ḥ vaneḥ paknaniṁ na lit·, na:ga punaga na gunuṁ, na:ga nagendra nagendrī, na:gari naga nagini mvahni haghni haghneya, gagana: dhinina: dhana dina, gana va:ṙhana va:hi viva:na, niti nitya ya nuṁ na lit i
ka ḥ dahana: jvalana pana, kaminīḥ vahinī ninī, puno vinava nivana, vinavani na lit ika ḥ saṁkṣepanya yan· vuvusәn·, yavat· rakva R̥bha puṙvva, pa bha ma di kunaṁ puṙvva, dadi na lit· dadi ṇa gәṁ na bhyaktanyan huvas kojar·, kekadeśanya kottaya, kocapa teki śa ṣa sa,
3
bhyaktanya matra vaṙṇnanәn·, // 0 // śambu śaṅkara śaraḥ śaraṇa śaśī, deśa deśī kaśaśaḥ śavala kaśaḥ, śva: śuci śuna śuraḥ śiva ca śaṇa, śanti śoka paśa śastra śuna śiśuḥ ḥ śamuṙdḍanya, teka: śakuR̥b umuni vunbunikahәn·, śaśaṅkaḥ śaṅkaḥ śaṅkhara kuśa kuśaḥ keśi kuśika, kuśanaśreka kro
śaḥ kraniki kata śabdeṁ śīriṇī, śikiṁ keśī keśa: R̥śa kuśika keśi kuśa kuśa śane śunya śreni gr̥ṇa piśuna neśrī haśaniśa, vinanaśa: mva ma:śa daśa diśi śarat· śura raśika, śiva: śambuḥ śula triśula śuśali śrīvava śiva, śavaḥ vaṅśa: veśaḥ śavari śivira:kaśa śacaya ḥ kṣaṇa kṣi
ṇi kapakṣa lakṣmi ṣaṇaya: hahәmmu: nidi, kagantuṁṅ agumantuṅeṁ ḍaḍaka naṁ ṣapr̥titala, prahr̥ṣṭī parituṣṭa roṣa koṣa kr̥ṣṇa vr̥ṣṭa ṣalumaḥ ṣapr̥tti tika mahaṙṣi mahoṣadha meheṣa meṣa nuṣa, R̥ṣaḥ muṣikha puśya poṣyakha puṣaḥ praṣaṣṭa: maṣa, ṣadhaṅguli
ṣadhaṅga bhuṣaṇa ṣubha: ṣaduṙ bha:ṣita, Aṣa:pa ṣadhayo ṣadhi puviṣam· dvipadha:ṣaṇa bhaviṣyati hiriṣya hiṙṣa:ṇa puṣaḥ huṣaḥ ṣaddha len·, viṣa viṣaya yomiśeṣa: dadi ma:nuṣa ka:ṣaya, nyataṁ kaluṣa kīlviṣaṅ aluṣa kaṣmala: ka:maṣa, nyataṁ mami ṣa yoṅgvan iṁ ṣa maR̥
naḥ naṅ inta: ta ya ḥ śa:ka:śa mvaṁ ṣapr̥tvi sadulur ika r̥ṅәn· yekahәn·, vaṙṇnanәn ta, śuśruśa: śiṣya śikṣya śviśita vtunikaṁ haśvaṣa: śeṣa:śeṣa:n·, śuśvat· śiṣinya śośvi śvaṣinaka ṣaśi de ka: vaśiṣṭa śaviṣṭī, maṅka teka:ṁ śa ṭavoṙ ṣa tayat iṅtiṅәt· yeki śakṣat· vtunya //
// ma:sa:nikaṁ sata nihan· vuvusәn padhanya, sa:dhu sada: sata sabha: sisi ta:sita:sī, sita: susatya rasa satrīya sa:ri saṁ hyaṁ, ⌈svera: sabha: sarisari sati sa:ra sari mva: sava: ṅasumatī basusena sunu, mvaṁṅ ekava:sa hupava:sa vinīsa vasa, duṙ=bha: si duṙyyasana duṙṅyasa
na prasasta, bya sa:sa sa:du sasivin sapujin sapuja: sasvaṅga saṅga sigi seṅgita saṙgga sajja, sә:gә: sgaṁ siga sugiḥ sigirin sagasor·, sasvaṙgga sa:gara sa:gorava sa:dhaka syaṁ, rat· kosvaniṁ sata sarat· paknanyas· kṣat· ḥ sura sapta saraḥ surasa sira sada, sama siḥ mapasә
n· savara suta saha, savinaṁ savanәn· sakala sakavasa, praja: nanmi sadantya niti kamivara Itiḥ paruṅguniṅ ha:kṣara // L̥ // nyan sutrasandī vuvusәn·, parakr̥tia lviṙnika pratiṅkaḥnya, Atambayan·, havkasan·, na:han ta ya sinaṅguḥhan· vaṙṇna tiniṅkaḥ pina
4
rva vkasan·, Ikaṁ namaḥ yekhihәn· śvara ṅaranya, yapvan kapuṙvya hanta, sinaṅguhan· vyañjana na:ma L̥, yan ta hadi samana, tumut sinami, I, puṙvyaka, vkasan· ghoṣa, sahle satrīsvi sabatәk·, Ā Ī Ū R̥̄ L̥̄, lviṙnya kavruhana diṙ=gha: ṅaranya manhәr·, A I U R̥ L̥, limaṁ vijī, sahaya,
sandy a:kṣara muvah aṅgәpan·, E Ai, O O, nahan· lviṙnya ḥ ka kha: ca kha: ta tha: pa pha:, saka tlu nahan sahayaniṅ aghoṣa, ga gha ṭa di ya ra la va ha, siloṣan· rakva na:manika vaṙgga ṅaranya limalikur·, ka pinakapuṙvyanika ma, mavkasan pinakavkasnya, ka ga kha limanya ya śuddhan·, ra śa ṣa: sa ha
yanya vuvudhaḥ Anunasikaṁ ṅa ña na na: ma, Antasta ṅaranikaṁ ya ra la va tuta, Usmana śa ṣa sa: ha simidaḥ, patiṅkaḥniṁs utrasandike sampun pratyekanikanaṁṅ akṣari riṁ vyañjana lavan· śyara, t ucapa ta sañjatanikahәn·, prakaraniṅ aranya kavruhana ṅaraniṅ ulu savaneḥ, makuṭa ruku
haśramastaka kapaphala, tijakula śekara maśira, nahan ta parina: maniṁ śr̥ṅga dīṙ=gha: hulu mapalenan·, Utәk lavan· tambara kuñcīr·, majaṭa, hagumbak· jambul aṅurai, syana: mani diṙ=gha: yan· riṁ hulu vindu lavan madana khunaṁ, kunaṁ kunaṁ len tara lavan· vintaṁ, tilaka titik khaṇi suraha
n·, nahan ta parina:maniṁ nandha nyan taṁ cakra jantra guluṅa:n·, sudaṙṣaṇa yuddha kr̥ṣṇa len sakaṭa, daśana:ma yeki huniṅa:n·, mvaṅ añakra hulu yuktī kavruhana yapyanikaṁ taliṅa nihan·, kuṇḍala capiṁ sumpiṁ le kaṙṇna, śrota suvәṁ myaṅ iṅt iṅә:t·, phalaga suna:maniṁ taliṅa diṙ=gha: ṅa:
ranya, tulalai, Iku taṅan· vastra len· galah adava:, kirivilī kuñca ya savaneḥ, Asiṅa: dava: diṙ=gha: rakveka Araśukha goduvva keśamavaju, kaṙ=ti kuna śaṅka len kuruṅa:n·, Ikaṁ kalambī lavan hana manuṅgaṁ, mathapatapu hana mapayuṁ, daśana:maniṁ taruṅ a:ranya nahan· yapya
n hatik magaṇitrī lavan gudduha, vaja saharuha, masurati bha:hu, bhamana jnu vaneḥ, visaṙjjaniyeki nahan sabatәk· ma:tī pjaḥ śunya turu kunaṁ, paratrakna bhajra līna guliṅan·, hana marukuḥ len asoṁsoṁ, nahan katṅәn ika:ya tiṅa:kәn saṅ añjñaṇanya, matkhәn· gadha śuku śuku, phalu pha
lu dana saha gadha, vәntis ya laris ya kakuritan·, Asiṅ a:dava: jәṁnya yeki knakәn· vatәk aluṅid· mvaṁ paṇḍī, curiga: gaḍiṁ candraha:ṣa suṅutinyun·, sihuṅ u:miṅis·, curik nahan yuktī kakyakyan· śiva:patra ya ta tinamphil·, masidkuṅ a:tyәṅ a:namluk siṅәl·, muṅgv iṁ pataraṇa,
5
n ban·tal karaṅ ulu yaya ta kvakvan·, hana ta hiṙ vḍihan aḍeṁ, kr̥tala bhujaga na:gap·śa pinutәṙnya, kadi vaṅkava: ya lummaṅkuṁ, laras· vinәṇṭaṁnya kakrakran· Aṅkus· galaḥnya bhuṇala, kuku manol sagayuṙ jәṅ a:sivur·, pahat· ya tiṙnavanya, nahan pasidkuṁṅ amluk tur·, kukunya tuma
kul kadī kru kru hana kaṅ iṇḍit· kuṙ lavak·, hanan pamava gadha: naka konta, tuhuk limpuṁ kr̥tala paṇḍi curik·, salviṙnikaṁ hiṅuṇḍa, yayanyan· ra jinuñjuṁ hika, // 0 // saṁ hyaṁ jagatrīpuruṣa, nama sivaya ta ṅhulun·, Amvit umastava kita, Amaṙṇnana vaṙva vtun· guruniṁ jagat kita ya, mulakṣa:
ra gu:ru laghu, matra haṙyya taṅ gaṇa, nahan· ṅaran taneṁ candha kīta maṅka rupa canda, gave titī mvaṁ sloka, ya ta vaṙṇnanīn kya vtun·, ya pinakaṣuluh i rat· lviṙniṁ canda ta ṅaranya, kveḥniṁ vilaṁniṅ akṣara, rikanaṁ pada sayatī, padha ṅaranya sakaṇḍaḥ pataṁ pada saśloka mulanya keṅtakna,
Akṣara tuṅgal iṁ yati, yeka sinaṅguḥ hantyanta, rvaṅ akṣara puyakhīḥta try akṣara madyama nama, pratiṣṭa pataṅ akṣara, śiṣapratiṣṭa yan lima, nmaṅ akṣara jagatrī Uṣṇik ri pituṅ akṣara, vyalu pya ya padanuṣṭup·, vruhati saṅa:ṅ akṣara, sapuluḥ pya sipakṣatī sasambaha pya savlas·,
ryavlas pya ya jagati, Atijagat tigavlas·, sakaṙyyaḥ pad·blas ika sakori ya limavlas·, Aṣṭīḥ nәm·blas ikahәn·, tyaṣṭī ḥnahan pituvlas·, na druti ya vyaluvlas· si vruddhiḥ ya ta salapan·, rvaṁpuluḥ pya ya nakr̥ti prakr̥ti ya ta salikur·, rvalikur ikaṅ akr̥tīḥ tluliku riṁ vakr̥tīḥ
, pad·likuṙ suna:makr̥tīḥ, bhakr̥tīḥ ya limalikur·, hanut kr̥tiḥ ya nәmlikur· // 0 // nahan pratiṅkaḥnya, sampun ika, samaṅkana vilaṁniṁ vrutiniṁ canda, yapyan· vliḥ sakeṁ nәmlikur·, ḍaṇḍa rakya ṅaranya, lviḥ saṅkerika, kalalu ṅaranya, ḍaṇḍaka hi ruhunya paduluṙnikaṁ
vr̥tti gnәp·, java javaniṁ canda sampun enak atut·, dinlīṅakәn· vinla vla, bhyaktanya ya vaṙṇnanәn sumiliṅ a:raniṁ laku nihan· naddha, bhadra, bhadrotiḥ, vaṇamr̥gī, vijayantī, tanumaddhya, kusumita gandha, madhukaralalīta, vatapatya, paddhanuṣṭup·, sapantika, kakridhita,
vidyutmala, bha:vacakra, bhramaraviL̥mbita, vikridita, kumaraviL̥mbīta, bhujaṅgasukr̥ta, Ayamuka, turidagatī, Ambәksuda, vahirat·, śadanaśrī, Anuntun·, jayendrabhajra, Upastita, doḥduḥka, śalisir·, vima:la, bhramaravilaśita, śvagata, ratodaka, maduvulamr̥ta,
6
bhikṣuka, drutaviL̥mbita, bhaṅśapatra, vīralalīta, raṣanetra, śrīpucaśa, giriśa, kuśumavicita, citralitī, parajīta, bhujaṅgaprayatna, bhramitakṣa, śatyadevī, navamaliṇī, kuśumapaddhanta, prahasīṇī, śasadana, matha:mayura, sambada, paraṇaśara, praharaṇakalīka, guṇanikara, malī
